title: Instructor
desc: Instructed a 5-week Human Computer Interaction course at the academy, including hands-on workshops.
Remodeled Python course curriculum and redesigned workshop material to inculcate supplemental content.
Assisted in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning workshops as a mentor personnel for more than 70 students.

title: Intern
desc: Revamped an Adaptive Learning Platform based on OpenEdx using Django and incorporated custom built algorithms and applications using SpringBoot.
Standardized development documentation and streamlined installation and reboot processes on existing lab servers.

title: Instructor
desc: Redesigned course curriculum and streamlined the flow of class for the Human Computer Interaction (HCI) course for Spring 22.
Incorporated web development and data analysis software to build attendance and grading systems that catered to the course requirements for over 100 students, the systems are currently operational.

title: Software Developer
desc: Designed user interface for online platform geared towards developing Key Performance Indicators for insurance agents at a reputed client Bank and its branches.
Generated Front-end functionalities using JavaScript, Ajax, and jQuery.
Refined the mailing interface directed towards broadcasting notices to client bank employees via the respective web-platform.

title: Intern
desc: Planned and launched a web platform which allows investors to interact with and invest in start-ups of their preference, and startups to display their value to investors.
Developed front-end and back-end technologies for the web-platform. Designed the user interface using HTML, CSS and PHP and maintained databases with help of MySQL.
